title: Apply Dynamic Data Masking to Sensitive Columns
description: As a database admin, ensure sensitive columns (Email and CreditCardNo) are hidden from non-privileged users. Implement column-level masking using Dynamic Data Masking (DDM) so that non-privileged users see masked values (e.g., 'rXXXX@XXXX.com' for emails and 'XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-5432' for credit card numbers), while privileged users see the original data.
